item.subject: News Section!
item.text:
In order to do a better job of announcing changes in the game, I've added a "News" section which will be displayed during login. It should only display news that you haven't seen yet, and you can use "Q" to quit out of the news display early.
If you want to see the news items at any point once in the game, use the NEWS command.

item.subject: Bug fixes
item.text: - Character facing direction is now saved - New characters will enter the game facing west - Fixed typos in 2nd level of South Gatehouse Tower - Paginated HELP, STATS (and more to come) - Fixed crash when player stumbled - Lowered the weight of keys - Only 1/2 of equipped item weight is counted towards encumbrance penalty
